name: AIA_Extraction_GetEndOfDocRange
description: Get page range for end of document
sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!numPages: tointeger(ri!section.rule.numPages),
  a!map(
    startPage: if(
      (ri!numPages - local!numPages) < 1,
      1,
      ri!numPages - local!numPages
    ),
    endPage: ri!numPages
  )
)
